Title: Daddy
Writer: Aleksandr Galich (novel), Vladimir Mashkov, Ilya Rubinshteyn
Actors: Vladimir Mashkov, Egor Beroev, Andrei Rozendent, Olga Krasko
Plot: Based on A. Galych's play "Matrosskaya Tishina", "Papa" tells a story of a Jewish father who dreamed of seeing his son perform on a stage in front of huge audiences, he dreamed of seeing ...
